thread.title: ANA S.
thread.title_full: Medisave US LLP reviewed by ANA S.

author: ANA S.
title: ANA S.
text:
Medisave was the only site I found who had fast shipping, most selection of products, impeccably superb customer service, and had the most affordable Littmann Stethoscopes that were customized perfectly, as I requested!
THANK YOU VERY MUCH MEDISAVE! The representative who responded very quickly to my inquires, offered a free exchange just in case I was not satisfied with the colors I ordered. The 2 Stethoscopes I purchased as gifts, were PERFECT!
I HIGHLY RECOMMEND Medisave to ALL of my friends, fellow colleagues, and to ALL!
